attributes.action: devolve all powers back to the monarchy
attributes.additional_details:
A Monarchy is essentially a Dictatorship with better reputation. This is the best way forward.

The government today are fannying about and the Queen is old and wise.

Look at North Korea, they're doing fine.
Please sign this petition. Yours sincerely,
Jamie and Jamie.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: We the people of the UNITED Kingdom respectfully ask HM The Queen to convene a Constitutional Convention

Created by: James Verduyn

Closing: 30/03/2015
